text:
@LauraCat76 No! 
I just brought home two adorable orange kittens. My brother and his wife (people who go everywhere, think the coronavirus is no big deal) wanted to come see them. 
I said NO! 
I don’t understand why everyone is buying into trump’s assumption that the virus is gone and NBD.
